TopicTitle: EVA mishap! Whiskey Tango...You get the idea.

Articles.Content:
I had a ship in Career Mode, in Low Munar Orbit. And me being science greedy I figured "Hey, let me do a quick EVA what can go wrong." I hit the EVA button and my kerbal goes spiraling out of control away from my ship. Im frantically hitting R, Space, H, N, J, K, and L and all the other buttons I can think of, and NOTHING is happening. I have to hit R a few times before his EVA pack goes into the stabilization phase, but then none of my other controls work. Anybody have any idea what is going on. I officially have a rogue Kerbal and out of control ship on their way to a Minmus encounter, and then off to the depths of space!

Thanks

John

jchad, your first thread didn't appear right away because your first few posts must be approved by a moderator in case you're a spambot. I've replied in your other thread, and will now close this one, since it's a duplicate.
